sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from 'react'; import {GlobalContext} from '../context/GlobalState'; import {numberWithCommas} from '../utils/format' const IncomeExpenses = () => { const {transactions} = useContext(GlobalContext) const amounts = transactions.map(transaction => transaction.amount) const income = amounts .filter(item => item > 0) .reduce((acc, item) => (acc += item), 0) .toFixed(2) const expense = amounts .filter(item => item < 0) .reduce((acc, item) => (acc += item), 0) * -1 .toFixed(2) return (

Income

${numberWithCommas(income)}

Expense

${numberWithCommas(expense)}

) } export default IncomeExpenses
